entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 February 2023
